metadata.synopsis: Dialog for the wheel of fortune mini-game operated by Akabi - the djinni, destroyer of the worlds. Players can win random magical items with side effects or try to uncover the cheating djinni performs and win a grind prize, upsetting him (which results in you being sent to a jungle to be eaten by dinosaurs).
metadata.how_to_trigger: Debug book, act 3, wyrm's crossing, circus of the last days. Go through the checkpoint, and akabis is straight ahead of you. He's the blue Djinni with the wheel next to him.

13.speaker: Akabi
13.text: LEAVE AKABI BE. HE IS WATCHING THE DRIBBLES' BEST PERFORMANCE.
13.context: NodeContext: (He's watching dribbles the clown, who he doesn't like, kill a bunch of people)

30.speaker: Akabi
30.text: AKABI IS TIRED OF THE WHEEL OF WONDERS. HE IS NOW CLOSED.

54.speaker: Player
54.text: The hells did you just call me?

1.speaker: Akabi
1.text: UGLY. HIDEOUS. VILE. YOU ARE FORTUNATE TO HAVE FOUND ME, FREAKISH ONE.

96.speaker: Akabi
96.text: SPIN TO WIN PRIZES BEYOND YOUR TINY IMAGINATION, AND MAKE YOUR MISERABLE LIFE MORE BEARABLE. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])

127.speaker: Player
127.text: What kind of things can I win?

94.speaker: Akabi
94.text: AKABI HAS TRAVELLED ACROSS THE PLANES - BURNING AND CONQUERING ALL. WIN THE SPOILS OF SUCH CONQUEST!

17.speaker: Akabi
17.text: OR, IF LUCK SMILES UPON YOU, WIN THE GRAND PRIZE - THE JACKPOT.

31.speaker: Akabi
31.text: NO MORE QUESTIONS. SPIN OR DON'T.

132.speaker: Player
132.text: I'd like to spin the wheel.
132.context: NodeContext: GESTURES TO HIS LEFT TO THE WHEEL

29.speaker: Akabi
29.text: LET US SEE IF YOU HAVE LUCK'S FAVOUR.
29.context: NodeContext: GESTURES TO HIS LEFT TO THE WHEEL

80.text: *You notice a glint in Akabi's beard - as it glows, the wheel moves away from the 'jackpot'. He is cheating.*

134.speaker: Akabi
134.text: *You notice a glint in Akabi's beard - as it glows, the wheel moves away from the 'jackpot'. He is cheating.*
134.context: CinematicNodeContext: Ring on akabi's finger briefly lights up

57.speaker: Player
57.text: *You notice a glint in Akabi's beard - as it glows, the wheel moves away from the 'jackpot'. He is cheating.*
57.context: CinematicNodeContext: Ring on akabi's finger briefly lights up

41.speaker: Player
41.text: *You notice a glint in Akabi's beard - as it glows, the wheel moves away from the 'jackpot'. He is cheating.*
41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Ring on akabi's finger briefly lights up

103.speaker: Akabi
103.text: *You notice a glint in Akabi's beard - as it glows, the wheel moves away from the 'jackpot'. He is cheating.*
103.context: CinematicNodeContext: Ring on akabi's finger briefly lights up

39.speaker: Narrator
39.text: *You notice a glint in Akabi's beard - as it glows, the wheel moves away from the 'jackpot'. He is cheating.*
39.context: CinematicNodeContext: Ring on akabi's finger briefly lights up

91.context: CinematicNodeContext: The wheel lands almost on the jackpot, but then passes it - on a random prize

20.text: ALAS - NO JACKPOT FOR YOU, UGLY ONE. BUT YOU MAY HAVE THIS.
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: The wheel lands on a random prize

0.text: ALAS - NO JACKPOT FOR YOU, UGLY ONE. BUT YOU MAY HAVE THIS.
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: The wheel lands on a random prize

23.speaker: Akabi
23.text: ALAS - NO JACKPOT FOR YOU, UGLY ONE. BUT YOU MAY HAVE THIS.
23.context: NodeContext: voice drops low, demeanor changes. Scary and menacing.

110.speaker: Player
110.text: You're cheating. I saw you rig the wheel.
110.context: NodeContext: voice drops low, demeanor changes. Scary and menacing.

27.speaker: Akabi
27.text: You dare speak to me as if we were equals? You are a scrap of food in my teeth. The dirt beneath my fingernails. You are nothing.
27.context: NodeContext: voice drops low, demeanor changes. Scary and menacing.

84.speaker: Akabi
84.text: I am, however, feeling gracious. So, I will forget this and allow you to spin again. Or I can turn you into something vile. Choose.
84.context: NodeContext: voice drops low, demeanor changes. Scary and menacing.

18.speaker: Player
18.text: Spin the wheel, watching for an opportunity to distract Akabi.
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of the wheel spinning

9.text: I'd love to hear about the adventures of such a famous djinni.
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of the wheel spinning

46.text: I'd love to hear about the adventures of such a famous djinni.
46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wheel is still turning.NodeContext: player has tried to distract akabi, and it has worked. He's loudly and cheerfully talking about himself

5.speaker: Player
5.text: I'd love to hear about the adventures of such a famous djinni.
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wheel is still turning.NodeContext: player has tried to distract akabi, and it has worked. He's loudly and cheerfully talking about himself

11.speaker: Akabi
11.text: AKABI IS MORE THAN A DJINNI. HE IS THE MOST MAGNIFICENT AND WONDROUS BEING IN THE REALMS. IN FACT -
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wheel is still turning.NodeContext: player has tried to distract akabi, and it has worked. He's loudly and cheerfully talking about himself

45.speaker: Akabi
45.text: AKABI IS MORE THAN A DJINNI. HE IS THE MOST MAGNIFICENT AND WONDROUS BEING IN THE REALMS. IN FACT -
45.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wheel is still turning.NodeContext: player has tried to distract akabi, and it has worked. He's loudly and cheerfully talking about himself

83.speaker: Akabi
83.context: CinematicNodeContext: The wheel lands on the jackpot.NodeContext: Akabi looks to his left in utter shock - horrified. The wheel has landed on the jackpot.

32.speaker: Player
32.text: So did you - I just evened the odds.
32.context: CinematicNodeContext: Makes some magical gestures. VFXes on top (we don't need to shop an actual teleportation, but, if we have time, we could show a quick vista over the jungle without any custom animations. NodeContext: Makes a grand dramatic gesture as he teleports the player away. Furious.

126.speaker: Akabi
126.context: CinematicNodeContext: Makes some magical gestures. VFXes on top (we don't need to shop an actual teleportation, but, if we have time, we could show a quick vista over the jungle without any custom animations. NodeContext: Makes a grand dramatic gesture as he teleports the player away. Furious.

16.speaker: Player
16.text: I have no idea what you're talking about.

109.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wheel is still turning.NodeContext: player has tried to distract Akabi, The player has failed.

89.speaker: Akabi
89.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wheel is still turning.NodeContext: player has tried to distract Akabi, The player has failed.

93.speaker: Player
93.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wheel is still turning.NodeContext: winces in pain, player has farted and akabi is disgusted. Maybe covering his nose or waving his hand?

120.text: AH. WHAT IS THAT VILE SMELL? ARE YOU DYING?
120.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wheel is still turning.NodeContext: winces in pain, player has farted and akabi is disgusted. Maybe covering his nose or waving his hand?

35.speaker: Akabi
35.text: AH. WHAT IS THAT VILE SMELL? ARE YOU DYING?
35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wheel is still turning.NodeContext: winces in pain, player has farted and akabi is disgusted. Maybe covering his nose or waving his hand?

14.speaker: Player
14.text: DO YOUR WORST, YOU CHEATING BASTARD.

66.speaker: Player
66.text: Forgive me - perhaps my eyes were mistaken.

108.speaker: Akabi
108.text: AKABI KNOWS YOU ARE STUPID, AND THUS FORGIVES YOU. NOW BEGONE.

26.speaker: Player
26.text: I'd love to, but I'm a little short...

25.speaker: Akabi
25.text: AKABI IS NOT A CHARITY. BEGONE.

59.speaker: Player
59.text: Nice trick rigging the wheel, but you need to work on your technique - it's obvious.
59.context: NodeContext: voice drops low, demeanor changes. Scary and menacing.

56.speaker: Akabi
56.text: You would accuse me, Akabi: Destroyer of Planes - of cheating?
56.context: NodeContext: voice drops low, demeanor changes. Scary and menacing.

78.speaker: Player
78.text: Nice try, but I know interplanar swindling when I see it. You rigged the spin.
78.context: NodeContext: THINKS HE'S BEING CHEERFUL AND CHARMING

55.speaker: Player
55.context: NodeContext: THINKS HE'S BEING CHEERFUL AND CHARMING

112.speaker: Akabi
112.text: YOU ARE WELCOME, PUTRID ONE. RETURN AGAIN TO TRY ANEW.
112.context: NodeContext: THINKS HE'S BEING CHEERFUL AND CHARMING

82.speaker: Akabi
82.text: YES! DROWN ME IN COIN, AND PERHAPS YOU SHALL WIN THE ULTIMATE PRIZE.

50.speaker: Akabi
50.text: NO. AKABI HAS BEEN DROWNED IN COIN AND IS BEREFT OF PRIZES. BEGONE - YOU HAVE ENOUGH OF HIS SPOILS.

33.speaker: Player
33.text: Me and my 'miserable' life are fine - thanks.

133.speaker: Akabi
133.text: THEN AKABI PITIES YOU. BEGONE, MISERABLE ONE.

99.speaker: Player
99.text: Your magic is potent - I can feel it from here. You must have quite the magical prizes.

81.speaker: Player
81.text: I want to try, but I don't have enough gold.

22.speaker: Akabi
22.text: HAH! AKABI APPLAUDS COURAGE EVEN WHEN IT BORDERS ON STUPIDITY. PERHAPS YOU SHALL BE VICTORIOUS.

63.speaker: Player
63.text: Incredible. I know a good set of pipes when I hear them, and you have them.

19.speaker: Player
19.text: A djinni? Must have been a long trek from the Elemental Plane of Air.

104.speaker: Akabi
104.text: THE SPONGY MORTAL RETURNS. SPIN THE WHEEL AND CHANGE YOUR FATE. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])
104.context: NodeContext: has sent player to a dinosaur realm. Player has returned - alive an annoyed. Akabi is being a cocy shit - big arrogant laugh

111.speaker: Akabi
111.text: HAH. HOW DID THE DESPICABLE CHEATER ENJOY THEIR VACATION?
111.context: NodeContext: has sent player to a dinosaur realm. Player has returned - alive an annoyed. Akabi is being a cocy shit - big arrogant laugh

85.speaker: Player
85.text: I had a lot of fun, actually. Thanks.
85.context: NodeContext: Clearly furious and not at all delighted.

2.speaker: Akabi
2.text: AKABI IS DELIGHTED YOU ENJOYED IT, REPUGNANT MORTAL. BEGONE - AKABI IS SICK OF YOU.
2.context: NodeContext: Clearly furious and not at all delighted.

74.speaker: Player
74.text: I won the jackpot - give it to me.

90.speaker: Akabi
90.text: YOU HAVE MY RING - THAT IS REWARD ENOUGH.

69.speaker: Akabi
69.text: NOW, BEGONE. AKABI IS BORED OF YOU.

117.speaker: Akabi
117.text: YOU ARE ALIVE. THAT IS GIFT ENOUGH.

107.speaker: Player
107.text: I'll make sure you pay for this.

115.speaker: Akabi
115.text: AKABI'S PRIZES ARE SPENT - AS IS HIS PATIENCE. THE WHEEL IS CLOSED.

118.speaker: Akabi
118.text: AKABI'S WHEEL IS CLOSED TO YOU, VILE CHEESY ONE.

119.speaker: Akabi
119.text: YOU FAILED TO WIN THE GRAND PRIZE BUT FEAR NOT, GROTESQUE ONE. TRY AGAIN - BE VICTORIOUS! ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])

4.speaker: Player
4.text: Spin the wheel, watching for an opportunity to distract Akabi.

71.speaker: Akabi
71.text: YES. YOU WILL WIN THE JACKPOT THIS TIME - I AM SURE OF IT.

106.speaker: Player
106.text: The last prize I won was nothing but junk.

58.speaker: Akabi
58.text: YOUR TINY MIND HAS FAILED TO SEE ITS TRUE POTENTIAL. AKABI PITIES YOU.

28.speaker: Player
28.text: What's the point - you've rigged it. Cheater.
28.context: CinematicNodeContext: Akabi snaps his fingers at the end of his line to transform the player into a cheese wheel.NodeContext: Big dramatic gestures as he unleashes his fury (he turns the player into a cheese wheel)

60.speaker: Akabi
60.text: AKABI WARNED YOU. BEHOLD - A FORM MORE FITTING OF YOUR STATUS.
60.context: CinematicNodeContext: Akabi snaps his fingers at the end of his line to transform the player into a cheese wheel.NodeContext: Big dramatic gestures as he unleashes his fury (he turns the player into a cheese wheel)

129.speaker: Akabi
129.text: DRIBBLES IS DEAD. JOYOUS NEWS. HE WAS MOST IRRITATING.

52.speaker: Akabi
52.text: BEHOLD - AKABI'S WHEEL OF WONDERS IS BETTER THAN ANY CLOWN.

51.speaker: Akabi
51.text: PERHAPS THIS TIME FATE SHALL GRANT YOU A BETTER PRIZE. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])

101.speaker: Akabi
101.text: SPIN TO WIN PRIZES BEYOND YOUR TINY IMAGINATION, AND MAKE YOUR MISERABLE LIFE MORE BEARABLE. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])

130.speaker: Akabi
130.text: BE MISERABLE, PATHETIC ONE. SOON THE CIRCUS SHALL LEAVE, AND WITH IT, AKABI'S WHEEL OF WONDERS.

128.speaker: Akabi
128.text: THIS MIGHT BE YOUR ONLY CHANCE TO WIN - THE JACKPOT! ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])
